import React from 'react'; import './AboutUs.css'; const AboutUs = () => { return (

About Newspaper Ad Booking

Connecting advertisers with readers since 2023

Our Story

Founded in 2023, Newspaper Ad Booking was created to revolutionize how businesses connect with their audiences through print media. We recognized the need for a streamlined platform that brings together advertisers and newspapers in one convenient place.

Our Mission

To provide the most efficient and comprehensive newspaper advertising platform, making it simple for businesses of all sizes to reach their target audiences through trusted print media channels.

Why Choose Us?

Wide Network

Access to hundreds of newspapers across the country

Competitive Pricing

Get the best rates for your advertisements

Easy Booking

Simple, intuitive platform for all your ad needs

Expert Support

Our team is here to help you succeed

Meet Our Team

John Smith

Founder & CEO

Sarah Johnson

Head of Advertising

Michael Chen

Technology Director

); }; export default AboutUs;
